channel.title: LRUG Nights RSS Feed
channel.description: LRUG.org London Ruby User Group : LRUG Nights : solving' crimes, drinkin' beers

item.title: Season 2, Episode 1
item.description:
Winter is coming! Let us make shelter in a lovely warm pub, for good chats and enjoyable times.

  • Where: Cittie of York map
  • When: Tuesday 4th December, 2012
  • Time: 6.30pm

Let us know if you might be coming via the Lanyrd event.

item.title: Episode #22: Heat Rays
item.description:
Tim Cowlishaw wants to pretend he's at the Scottish Ruby Conference by drinking whisky in a pub in London and chatting about Ruby. It'll be just like being there:

  • Where: Lord Wargrave (it's got all the whisky) map
  • When: Thursday 28th June, 2012
  • Time: 6.30pm

Let us know if you might be coming via the Lanyrd event.

item.title: Episode #21: A Closer Look
item.description:
Chris Lowis is our host for the latest in our (admittedly irregular) social meetups. His announcement to the list is well worth a read, but the gist is:

Where: The Sun Inn in Bethnal Green http://www.suninnbethnalgreen.co.uk/ When: Tuesday 6th March, 2012 Time: 6.30pm

Let us know if you might be coming via the Lanyrd event.

item.title: Episode 'And again'
item.description:
Come join some of the LRUG regulars in The Water Poet on Monday 22nd August, 2011.

Let us know if you might be coming via the Lanyrd event.

item.title: Episode "let's try this again"
item.description:
James Darling is making a brave effort to restart these LRUG Nights. Come join some of the LRUG regulars in The Old Kings Head on Tuesday 22nd March, 2011.

Let us know if you might be coming via the Lanyrd event.

item.title: Episode: The Mitch Factor
item.description:
So rumour has it that Mitch Buchannon is still on the run but due to technical difficulties he is stuck in a pub located somewhere in London.

We've used the latest tracking technology and reckon the Mitre is where he will be hiding. Sources suggest that he will be in the premises on Tuesday (tonight) 24th August from 6.30pm. Hopefully see you there!

item.title: Episode... technical difficulties, normal viewing will resume shortly
item.description: It looks like we've lost Mitch Buchannon. My sources tell me he'll be in the Strongroom Bar, 6:30pm tonight, Monday 28th June 2010. All American Beers. We'd better get there for then.

item.title: Episode #20: Rendezvous
item.description:
Episode 20 of LRUG Nights will take place on Tuesday, March 30th 2010.

The week after the Scottish Ruby Conference there'll be a few visiting rubyists coming through London on their way home. A few of them have got in touch and so we've arranged a special LRUG Nights to meet up with them. We'll be spending the night in The Harrison Bar, starting at 6:30pm.

Come along if you want to say hi and get the low-down of the conference if you missed it, or continue the conference socializing if you did go. Mitch might even make an appearance if he get's done dealing with an embezzling wife and her murderous husband.

Also see:

  • Upcoming
  • A map

item.title: Episode #19: Epilogue
item.description:
Episode 19 of LRUG Nights will take place on Wednesday January 6th 2010.

Our normal meetings will be changing venue starting with the January meeting, and so we need to find a new post-meeting pub. This extra-special LRUG Nights is tasked with that mission. We'll start at 6:30pm in our old drinking den The Crown to say goodbye to it, and then it's off to the areas surrounding our new venue to seek out a replacement. Chances are we'll checkout a few of the pubs in these areas:

  • Clerkenwell
  • Barbican

Come along if you want to help our mission (and indulge in some ruby chat). Mitch won't be there as he's dealing with some step-father based murder investigation.

Also, see Upcoming

item.title: Episode #18: Vengeance
item.description:
A prison escapee vows to kill everyone associated with his conviction. Garner was one of the arresting officers.

The escapee is flying in on Tuesday 21st July. To ensure he can't get his bloody revenge, we're going to hide out upstairs in "The Ship" near Monument tube station.

  • Pub
  • Upcoming
  • Map
  • More info

All the best, Mitch.
